Q_DESC:
(Sum the digits in an integer)

 Write a program that reads an integer between 0 and 1000 and adds all the digits in the integer. 

For example, if an integer is 932, the
sum of all its digits is 14.

Hint: 
Use the % operator to extract digits, and use the / operator to remove the
extracted digit. For instance, 932 % 10 = 2 and 932 / 10 = 93.
